about_the_game:
The world has come to an end. Welcome to the unique Dieselpunk 2D Action Adventure game.

  • Become a hero whose consciousness has been transferred to a mechanical shell.
  • Explore a detailed 2D world. Unique architecture and traditional frame-by-frame animation awaits you.
  • Ammo and resources are limited, use them wisely.
  • Find out the truth behind the death of an entire Archipelago.
  • Engage in an unequal battle with the rebellious mechatrons army.

content_descriptors.notes: There is no sexual scenes or other inappropriate stuff. Just fantasy violence. Sometimes pixel corpses.

short_description: Erra: Exordium is a 2D action adventure game in Dieselpunk setting. Explore a world based on Sumerian-Akkadian mythology. Take the role of a scientist who was able to cheat death and fight the rebellious army of mechatrons.
supported_languages: English, Ukrainian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
